hibernate-mapping.query: select receiver from com.rssl.phizic.business.dictionaries.PaymentReceiverBase as receiver where receiver.login.id = :loginId and (receiver.state='ACTIVE') and ((:extra_name is null) or (:extra_name = '') or upper(receiver.name) like '%' || :extra_name || '%') and ((:extra_account is null) or (:extra_account = '') or receiver.account like '%' || :extra_account || '%') and ((:extra_bankName is null) or (:extra_bankName = '') or upper(receiver.bankName) like '%' || :extra_bankName || '%') order by receiver.name
